natural solution: By the order of operations, we perform the multiplications before the additions and subtractions: \begin{align} 9-8+7\times 6 +5-4\times 3+2-1 &= 9-8+42 +5-12 + 2 -1\\ &=1 + 42 +5-12 + 2-1\\ &=48-12 + 2 -1\\

 &= 36 +1 = \boxed{37}. \end{align}

shows  "9 - 8 + 7 * 6 + 5 - 4 * 3 + 2 - 1 = 37"
